main event: Multiple reports from Uruguay of a self luminous object observed on July 8, 1958.
interesting points: The principal witness is identified as Sebastian., The sighting duration lasted 18 minutes., The object was described as having a bluish white light and produced a tremendous noise when passing over certain areas., The investigation linked the sightings across a vast area from Rocha to Soriano., There were claims that the object displayed maneuvers indicating it was controlled by some intelligence.
